name: Jungle Joy Free
description: In this strategic game Jungle Joy, you have to play as a funny elephant. Choose rabbit or turtle to play with, take him in your trunk and throw as far as possible to achieve the highest points. You have 5 shots to throw. If you achieve a certain distance you will get bonus shots to score more points. There are lion, snake, gorilla, giraffe, tiger, tree and eagle, out of them some are your friends to help you score more and some are there to stop you making high scores. Just make a perfect combination of angle and power to throw them longest. Enjoy this addictive game with fine graphics, dense forest landscapes and more. Awesome sound effects and cool animations will keep you busy for several hours. Beat your own records of throwing them in this adventurous game.
